<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zephyr Hawk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2973)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Zephyr hawks drift among the currents of the [Plane of Air](/Planes.aspx?ID=29) in great flocks. They delight in riding the air currents with no destination in mind.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zephyr_Hawk.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Zephyr Hawk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2973)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=527" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 140 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 36

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wing +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing

**Circling Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The zephyr hawk Flies up to half its Speed, makes two wing Strikes, then Flies up to half its Speed again to return to its original location. The second half of this movement doesn't trigger reactions. Both attacks count toward the zephyr hawk's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it makes both attacks.

</column>
